segments.text: Oh, what a disgusting sight this kitchen has become.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is spilling everywhere from that overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's soaking the cabinet doors and pooling on the floor like filth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot is in that nasty puddle, and she doesn't even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Drying dishes while ignoring the mess—how gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are climbing around in this chaos for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stool is wobbling in the wet area; slippery and unclean.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're grabbing cookies with hands that might touch the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaching up—everything feels sticky and contaminated.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Open cabinets exposing the jar amid all this sloppiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the pretty garden view can't mask the interior grime.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such avoidable dirt and disorder.
segments.speaker: PAR
